message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product for $100. It's a one-time opportunity to get a product at a fixed price. If you buy it, you'll get a unique item that I'm sure you'll find useful. Plus, think of it as an investment in our future business relationship.
I'll take a chance and buy the product, hoping it's high quality
